timeline.bodyText: Package name should be all lowercase, so deviceconnection.
timeline.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: My bad. I have changed it now.
replies.author: kaniyan

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/services/device-registry-base/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/service/deviceConnection/AutowiredDeviceConnectionAdapter.java b/services/device-registry-base/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/service/deviceconnection/AutowiredDeviceConnectionAdapter.java
similarity index 96%
rename from services/device-registry-base/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/service/deviceConnection/AutowiredDeviceConnectionAdapter.java
rename to services/device-registry-base/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/service/deviceconnection/AutowiredDeviceConnectionAdapter.java
index b0a8ce60e..5a67b84c3 100644
--- a/services/device-registry-base/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/service/deviceConnection/AutowiredDeviceConnectionAdapter.java
+++ b/services/device-registry-base/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/deviceregistry/service/deviceconnection/AutowiredDeviceConnectionAdapter.java

@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
  * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0
  *******************************************************************************/
 
-package org.eclipse.hono.deviceregistry.service.deviceConnection;
+package org.eclipse.hono.deviceregistry.service.deviceconnection;
 
 import org.eclipse.hono.service.deviceconnection.DeviceConnectionService;
 import org.eclipse.hono.service.deviceconnection.EventBusDeviceConnectionAdapter;
